```{r fig.align='centre'}

#Ideal Nutrition Graph

Type <- c('core', 'Ideal Score')
Score <- c(20, 50)
first_name="Kong"
data <- data.frame(Type, Score)

name <- paste(first_name,"'s", sep="")

ggplot(data, aes(x = Type , y = Score, fill = Type)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  
  coord_polar(theta = "y") +  
  
  xlab("") + ylab("") +
  
  ggtitle(paste(name,"Nutrition Score"))+
  
  theme(axis.text.y = element_blank() , axis.ticks = element_blank(), plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))

```
